title: CDN Server
overview:
This Project features a basic cdn server built using node.js and express.js.
For Images it features resizing and cropping.
CSS Files are minified before they are sent to the client.
JS Files are minified and compressed before they are sent to the client.

Further placeholder images can be generated just by entering the width and/or height into the image url.
CSS and JS Files are automatically minified and/or compressed.
These minified files can be stored inside the cache to decrease the loading time on the next load of the file.
You can find out more in the README of the Project on GitHub.
